name: bj-spimedv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl6(w0, w1, wex(s0, w2), wal(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))
-| wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Version of ~ spimed with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
